head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SANDS, GEORGE E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SANDS, GEORGE E.

block.p: SANDS-George E. Died peacefully in his 100th year on September 16, 2000. Beloved husband of Marjorie U. Sands. Devoted stepfather of Charlotte Stadler and Julia Shubik. Grandfather to Claire Shubik, Daniel, Alex and David Stadler. Great-grandfather to Henry and Lily Stadler. Memorial services at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street, Tuesday, September 19, 11:30 AM. Contributions in his memory may be made to The Long Island Caddie Scholarship Fund C/O John Buckley, 15 Homestead Drive, Wheatley Heights, New York 11798, or to a charity of your choice.
